actions.text: Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the Kennedy (MA) amendment (A023). Mr. Regula stated that the amendment amends text previously amended and as such, is not in order. The Chair sustained the point of order.

purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 12, as amendment No. 55 that reduces the appropriation from the Forest Service Construction account by $5 million; and reduces the appropriation for the National Forest System account by $13.5 million.
